@title PerpetualMarket
 @dev Core contract for perpetual futures trading

@dev Apply funding payments

 @param _trader Address of the trader to liquidate
@dev Pause trading

 @dev Interface for collateral management

 @param _amount Amount of fees to collect
@dev Claim accrued rewards

 @param _newRate New utilization rate (scaled by PRECISION)

 @dev Interface for price oracle contracts
